name: GymScout
description: Full-stack location-based gym location app with real-time review and ratings system.

name: Abel
description: An multi-language speech-bot designed to offer realtime AI-based voice-conversations with personalized conversational avatars.

name: Devsurf
description: Full-stack developer journal web-application that helps in increasing developer productivity.

name: Drug Checking Program Portal
description: Web-based platform that helps citizens easily check and track their drug test results in real-time.

name: Moon-Markers 2.0
description: A web application that allows space-enthusiasts to visualise moon-quakes on a 3D render of the moon, from the Apollo Seismic Event Catalogue.

name: SD Naloxone Website
description: This platform facilitates the distribution of Naloxone, a life-saving medication for individuals at risk of opioid overdose.
